targets.query:
from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_users")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pfsense_201")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pfsense_201")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] != "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "processes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "blocked" or r["_field"] == "idle" or r["_field"] == "running" or r["_field"] == "sleeping" or r["_field"] == "zombies" or r["_field"] == "wait")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> limit(n:1)

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load15" or r["_field"] == "load5")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "pfsense_201")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pf")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "match" or r["_field"] == "state-insert" or r["_field"] == "state-mismatch")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> limit(n:1)

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem" or r["_measurement"] == "swap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "degrees")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "in")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"], mode:"by")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> top(n: 10)
  |> drop(columns:["_start","_stop"])

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "out")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"], mode:"by")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> top(n: 10)
  |> drop(columns:["_start","_stop"])

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "in")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Blocked Inbound"})
  |> group()

from(bucket: "pfsense_201")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "out")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Blocked Outbound"})

  |> group()

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ip_evaluated")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["geoip_code"], mode:"by")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_dnsbl_log")
  |> group(columns: ["tld"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_dnsbl_log")
  |> group(columns: ["tld"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"], mode:"by")
  |> count(column: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> group()
  |> top(n: 10)
  |> drop(columns:["_start","_stop"])

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_dnsbl_log")
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["tld"], mode:"by")
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> top(n: 10)

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "in")
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip", "dest_ip","dest_port"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> top(n: 10)

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "in")
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["dest_port"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> top(n: 10)

from(bucket:"${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_dnsbl_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "blocktype")
  |> group(columns: ["feed_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> top(n: 10)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop"])

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "out")
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["dest_port"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> top(n: 10)

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "out")
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip", "dest_ip","dest_port"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> top(n: 10)

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "in")
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip", "dest_ip","protocol"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> top(n: 10)

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "in")
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["protocol"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> top(n: 10)

from(bucket:"${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "action")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["feed_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> top(n: 10)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "out")
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["protocol"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> top(n: 10)

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "tail_ip_block_log")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "direction")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "out")
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["src_ip", "dest_ip","protocol"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> top(n: 10)

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gateways")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "delay")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["gateway_name"] =~ /^${WAN_GW:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: -1m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["friendlyname"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> drop(columns: ["_field","_time","source","_start","_stop","_measurement","host", "ip4_subnet","ip6_subnet"])

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gateways")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "loss")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["gateway_name"] =~ /^${WAN_GW:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

intInfo = 
from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: -1m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> rename(columns: {ip4_address: "ipaddress", name: "interface"})


gwInfo = 
from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: -1m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gateways")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "source" or r["_field"] == "status" or  r["_field"] == "gwdescr" or r["_field"] == "monitor" or r["_field"] == "defaultgw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["gateway_name"] =~ /${WAN_GW:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])
  |> rename(columns: {source: "ipaddress"})


   
join(
    tables: {gwInfo: gwInfo, intInfo: intInfo},
    on: ["interface"],
)
  |> group(columns: ["gateway_name"])

  |> last(column: "friendlyname")
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["gwdescr","interface","ipaddress_gwInfo","monitor","name","status", "defaultgw"])

from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: -1m, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["friendlyname"] == "${NetInterface}")
  |> keep(columns:["name","friendlyname","ip4_address","ip6_address","mac_address"])
  |> unique(column: "friendlyname")
  |> group(columns:["interface"])

intInfo =   from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["friendlyname"] == "${NetInterface}")
  |> distinct(column: "friendlyname")
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
  |> rename(columns: {name: "interface"})


netStats = 
from(bucket: "pfsense_201")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  

 
join(
    tables: {netStats: netStats, intInfo: intInfo},
    on: ["interface"],
)

intInfo =   from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["friendlyname"] == "${NetInterface}")
  |> distinct(column: "friendlyname")
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
  |> rename(columns: {name: "interface"})


netStats = 
from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  

 
join(
    tables: {netStats: netStats, intInfo: intInfo},
    on: ["interface"],
)

intInfo =   from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["friendlyname"] == "${NetInterface}")
  |> distinct(column: "friendlyname")
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
  |> rename(columns: {name: "interface"})


netStats = 
from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: -30d, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> derivative(unit: 30d, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: mean)
  

 
join(
    tables: {netStats: netStats, intInfo: intInfo},
    on: ["interface"],
)

intInfo =   from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["friendlyname"] == "${NetInterface}")
  |> distinct(column: "friendlyname")
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
  |> rename(columns: {name: "interface"})


netStats = 
from(bucket: "pfsense_201")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "packets_recv" or r["_field"] == "packets_sent")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  

 
join(
    tables: {netStats: netStats, intInfo: intInfo},
    on: ["interface"],
)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface")
  |> group(columns:["_measurement"])
  |> unique(column:"friendlyname")
  |> keep(columns:["friendlyname","name","ip4_address","ip6_address"])
list.label: Network Interface
list.name: NetInterface
list.query:
from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "interface")
  |> group(columns:["_measurement"])
  |> unique(column:"friendlyname")
  |> keep(columns:["friendlyname","name","ip4_address","ip6_address"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gateways")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "defaultgw")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> unique(column:"interface")
  |> group(columns:["interface", "gateway_name"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns:["gateway_name","interface"])
list.label: WAN Gateway
list.name: WAN_GW
list.query:
from(bucket: "${dataSource}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gateways")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "defaultgw")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> unique(column:"interface")
  |> group(columns:["interface", "gateway_name"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns:["gateway_name","interface"])
